resources.string: I am java developer with 5 years of experience in developing software applications, I am backend developer and have experience with technologies like java, spring, springboot, and different database designs
Address: 600 south MacArthur blvd apt 328 Coppell Texas 75019

Key skills and Experience: Bachelor\'s Degree in Electronics and Telecommunication, 4 years of experience in developing, deploying, and maintaining business-critical enterprise software as key member of elite technical teams. Highly versatile; constantly developing expertise in new and emerging technologies. Hands-on experience in software development and testing using Java

Accomplished software engineer with more than 6 years of overall IT industry experience, including 4 years of experience in developing, deploying, and maintaining business-critical enterprise software as key member of elite technical teams. Highly versatile; constantly developing expertise in new and emerging technologies. Hands-on experience in software development and testing using Java. Adaptable team player with talent for collaboration and communication with diverse technical and cross-functional teams and interested in learning new technologies.
